videoDataSync.ftue: Auto-detected subtitle tracks can be selected here. asbplayer does not know how to detect subtitles on every site. You can always load your own subtitle files.

ftue.welcomeBody: SprawdÅº sekcjÄ™ <0>readme</0>, aby zobaczyÄ‡ jak zaczÄ…Ä‡.
ftue.welcomeBody2: Scroll down for a quick intro, or check out the <0>user guide</0>.
ftue.toolbar: Click the ğŸ§© icon in the toolbar, and select <0>asbplayer</0> to open the asbplayer <1>Popup</1>.<2/>Use the ğŸ“Œ button to pin asbplayer to the toolbar for easy access.
ftue.sidePanel: Use the <0>Side Panel</0> to <1>navigate</1> between subtitles, <2>mine</2> subtitles, and more.
ftue.overlayScroll: <0>Scroll</0> the rightmost control to switch between <1>subtitle navigation</1>, <2>subtitle offset</2>, and <3>playback rate</3> controls.
ftue.overlay: Use the <0>Video Overlay</0> to <1>mine</1> and <2>toggle</2> subtitles, <3>switch playback modes</3>, and more.
ftue.congrats: That's it for the basics! Feel free to play around on this page.
ftue.loadSubtitles: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. Use the <0>Side Panel</0> to load subtitles onto the video on this page.<1/>Hint: The <2>Side Panel</2> can be accessed through the <3>Popup</3>.
ftue.loadSubtitlesFirefox: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. <0>Right-click</0> on the video and find the asbplayer <1>context menu</1> to load subtitles.
ftue.loadSubtitlesMobile: The first step to using asbplayer is always to load subtitles onto a video. Open the track selector by selecting <0>asbplayer</0> in the <1>extensions</1> menu.
ftue.ankiConnectError: Once you've opened Anki and installed AnkiConnect, clicking the âŸ³ button should make the error go away.
ftue.deck: Select the <0>Deck</0> where you want your cards to go.
ftue.defaultDeck: If you don't have any decks yet, you can <0>create the default one</0>.
ftue.anki: <0>Anki</0> is the most popular flashcard program in the world. It uses an algorithm called <1>SRS</1> to make learning information very efficient.
ftue.ankiDialog: Use the <0>Anki Export Dialog</0> to create Anki flashcards. In most cases, asbplayer can fill out <1>sentence</1>, <2>image</2>, and <3>audio</3> automatically.
ftue.configureAnki: Click here to configure asbplayer's integration with Anki.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinition: Put any details you want to remember about the sentence in the <0>Definition Field</0>.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinitionHint: Hint: A dictionary extension like <0>Yomitan</0> makes this really easy.
ftue.noteType: Select the <0>Note Type</0> for your cards. The <1>Note Type</1> determines how the front and back of your cards will look.
ftue.defaultNoteType: If you don't have any note types yet, you can <0>create the default one</0>.
ftue.ankiFields: The rest of the drop-downs configure how content gets mapped into fields of your card.
ftue.testCard: When ready, you can create a test card to see how it looks.
